pkgmetadata.longdescription: Australian Tax Policy Analysis // A series of functions focused on costing and evaluating Australian tax policy in support of the Grattan Institute's Australian Perspectives program. For access to the 'taxstats' package, please run install.packages("taxstats", repos = "https://hughparsonage.github.io/drat/", type = "source"). N.B. The 'taxstats' package is approximately 50 MB.
